attributes.action: Restore parliamentary democracy to the UK after the EU referendum
attributes.background: It was a mistake to call a referendum upon a matter so complex as membership of the EU. However, there is no legal compulsion for Parliament to implement its conclusion. Any legislation to depart the EU, or any triggering of Article 50 should be put to a free vote of Parliament.

rejection.details:
We think the following petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/133540
